about_the_game:
The Inner Sphere New Player Packs feature some of the best Hero BattleMechs the Inner Sphere has to offer, with specifically selected, new player-friendly 'Mechs. This Pack features the popular Warhammer WHM-BW "Black Widow", with 4 ballistic hardpoints, 4 energy hardpoints, 1 missile hardpoints, and a deadly sting! The Black Widow includes unique hardpoints, a unique skin, and a 30% C-Bill boost! This Pack also includes 1 'Mech Bay, 3000 MC, 6.5 million C-Bills, 30 Days Premium Time, 100 GSP, and 3 cockpit items - 2 of which have additional, and stackable C-Bill boosts! Combine those with the Hero 'Mech C-Bill boost and the 30 Days of Active Premium Time included in this pack, and you will be rolling in currency! Premium Time increases your in-game earnings when you play C-Bill(50%), XP(50%), and Accolades(5%).
The Inner Sphere New Player Pack - Heavy also includes:

  • 1 'Mech Bay
  • 3000 MC
  • 6.5 Million C-Bills
  • 100 GSP
  • 30 Days Active Premium Time
  • Standing Cockpit Item: "C-Bill Hologram" (5% C-Bill boost - IS only)
  • Hanging Cockpit Item: "C-Bill Medallion" (5% C-Bill boost - IS only)
  • Mounted Cockpit Item: Camouflaged Radio Warhorn
